name: Normal Train Game (Global Game Jam 2018)
description:
Just a regular ride on a normal train.

Take a walk around and enjoy your trip.

  •  WASD to move around
  •  Left Click to interact with objects, pick up items, and open doors
  •  Right Click to zoom

Made for the Global Game Jam 2018.  The Global Game Jam is an annual event where small teams get together to make a game from scratch in under 48 hours. 

The theme of 2018 was "Transmission".

Made By:

David Eichmann

Michael Gillon

Craig Innes

David Strachan
